import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Register(props) { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '', }); const { name, email, password, password2 } = user; const onChange = (e) => setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault; }; return (
